class_notes: This course provides statistical tools for modeling and forecasting financial data. Topics include: Evidence on the predictability of stock and bond indexes. Forecasting equity returns with dividend yields and other standard variables. Factor models for the cross-section of equity returns, and factor selection techniques. Simulating and estimating affine models of the term structure. Time series analysis with applications to volatility modeling.
course_description: This course provides statistical tools for modeling and forecasting financial data. Topics include: Evidence on the predictability of stock and bond indexes. prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MAF program.
